    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CardLayoutDemo
     
    ErpClient
    ErpClient is responsible for starting app.
    First
    Class First is here.
    IPage
    IPage is a base class for all pages with titles on left sidebar.
    Java11HttpClientExample
     
    JTabbedPaneWithCloseButton
    Write a description of class JTabbedPaneWithCloseButton here.
    LoginPane
    LoginPane is for login user and load menu on main frame
    MainPanel
    MainPanel is set to the main frame and show side menu with header info, allows to set innerPanel.
    Menu
    Helper to create manage and populate Menu JTree
    MenuItem
    MenuItem is element of MainMenu which consist of menu item name, menu item pane class name and parent_id that is id of parent menu item
    MenuSettings
    MenuSettings page.
    MenuSettingsAddEdit
    Фрейм для добавления/редактирования нового элемента меню.
    ResponseLoginJson
     
    ResponseMenuJson
     
    ServerService
    ServerService class responsible for communication with server.
    Settings
    Settings page.
    Test
     
    Test2
     
    TimeClient
    This program is a socket client application that connects to a time server to get the current date time.
